New Records: Afghanistan scored 183 runs in 20 overs, their highest score in the match.
Rahmanullah Gurbaz scored 76 runs, his highest in the innings.
Fazalhaq Farooqi took 5 wickets, a new record for Afghanistan in this match.
Key Match Events: Afghanistan won by 125 runs, the largest margin in the match.
Fazalhaq Farooqi's 5-wicket haul was a standout performance.
Rahmanullah Gurbaz's 76-run innings was the highest score by an Afghanistan player in this match.
Pre-Game Insights: Uganda elected to bat first in the match.
Afghanistan's batting powerplay scored 66 runs in the first 6 overs without losing a wicket.
Post-Match Reflections: Fazalhaq Farooqi was named Player of the Match for his exceptional performance.
Afghanistan earned 2 points, while Uganda earned 0 points.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was the 5th match in Group C of the ICC Men's T20 World Cup 2024.
The match was held at Providence Stadium, Guyana.
Others: The match had a significant margin of victory, highlighting Afghanistan's dominance.
The match flow details provided insights into key moments of the game.
